quotes.quote: We hide our demons so good, that the angels we show, bare the shame on their faces.
Demons are former celebrities who prey on their own insecurities.
Our demons are our own limitations, which shut us off from the realization of the ubiquity of the spirit, each of these demons is conquered in a vision quest.
Demons run when a good man goes to war.
Demons are like obedient dogs; they come when they are called.
Demons may be either good or bad, like any other class of beings.
Demons wait at crossroads attempting to influence our decisions.
Sometimes you control your demons and sometimes it controls you.
Demons manifest themselves in people in different ways. For instance, out of nowhere, somebody can become very angry for no reason. That's not just an emotion. That's a demon.
Demons don't play by the rules. They lie and they cheat and they stab in the back.
Demons were like genies or philosophy professors if you didn't word things exactly right, they delighted in giving you absolutely accurate and completely misleading answers.
The demons that make a person afraid are the hardest to cast out.
Everywhere I looked, demons of the future were on the battlegrounds of one's emotional plane.
When the Devil is not fishing he is mending his nets.
Demons are demons, and if you have them, you can either put them away, exorcize them, or carry them with you.
